interpretation: The "envelope with arrow" card represents a message or news that is coming your way. This could be in the form of a letter, email, or even a text message. It suggests that communication is on the horizon and you should be prepared for it. The card also indicates the need for timely action and a quick response. This could be a call to take action on a pending task or to respond to an important message. The "envelope with arrow" card reminds us to be attentive and responsive to the messages that we receive, as they could be significant in our personal or professional life. It may also be a sign of new opportunities, so keep an open mind and embrace the changes that are coming your way.
